reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt cute and well-fitting, with one mentioning it hits right below the hips. Customers describe it as comfortable and fun to wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Very cute and nice quality Color is really nice Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Amytomkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive and fun!
items.body: This is such a cute sweater! I love the design. It may not be the softest yarn but its’s not uncomfortable. Definitely a good choice for holiday parties! It’s different from all the typical red and green which is fun. Read more
items.author: Emily Wilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive and Fun!
items.body: Very cute and festive. Comfortable and true to size. Read more
items.author: Courtney A Rappoport

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: Runs smaller than I expected, but still fit ok Read more
items.author: Kathryn Lummus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Surprisingly good quality. Took a long time to arrive, but it’s a good sweater. Cute and warm. Fits true to size. Read more
items.author: annie4384

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!
items.body: This turned out to be a really cute sweater. Not too thick, not too thin. True to size. I washed it inside out on the delicate cycle and air dried it. Looked perfect! Read more
items.author: Shoegirl69

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weird sleeves
items.body: The sweater is as cute as it could be. The fit leaves a lot to be desired. The sleeves were too long - which I could deal with by cuffing them but I could not deal with how small the upper arms of the sleeves were. Just too tight for me. Read more
items.author: KG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Holiday Sweater! Perfect for My Holiday Skirt!
items.body: I’ve had my eye on this sweater a few different times and just never hit “buy” for whatever reason. I even waited for Prime Day, but it barely went on sale. So it just sat outside my cart for weeks until there was finally a little discount, and I decided to go for it. I’m glad I did. I bought it to pair with a sequin feather skirt from another vendor who makes pink holiday pieces, and I thought this would be cute with that and with jeans as just a bright, festive sweater for the season. When it arrived, it looked like a really nice, quality sweater. It is a bit thin and slightly see-through in a few places, but once you put it on, it’s not bad at all. And honestly, I prefer that because I live in a warm climate and heavy sweaters can be miserable. This one feels good, isn’t too hot, and layers easily. Overall, it did not disappoint. I love the fit, the quality, and the price I paid. Very happy with this purchase! Certainly happy holidays! Read more
items.author: Elleindeed19

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Xoxo, Z58 Orange Boo, Z512 Mardi Gras, Z White Heart, Green Shamrock, White Lucky, Z512 White Mardi, Z58 Black Boo, White Xoxo, Black Holly Jolly, Black Heart, Black Love, Z512 White Mardi Gras, Z510 Wine Red Merry. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
